params.poolId: The id of the stargatePool used in the LP_STAKING_TIME contract.

constructor.details: The ASSET_TYPE, necessary for the deposit and withdraw logic in the Accounts, is "1" for ERC20 tokens.

params.asset: The contract address of the asset.
params.creditor: The contract address of the Creditor.

returns.collateralFactor: The collateral factor of the asset for the Creditor, 4 decimals precision.
returns.liquidationFactor: The liquidation factor of the asset for the Creditor, 4 decimals precision.

params.asset: The contract address of the asset.
params.creditor: The contract address of the Creditor.

returns.collateralFactor: The collateral factor of the asset for a given Creditor, with 4 decimals precision.
returns.liquidationFactor: The liquidation factor of the asset for a given Creditor, with 4 decimals precision.
returns.valueInUsd: The value of the asset denominated in USD, with 18 Decimals precision.

params.asset: The contract address of the asset. param assetId The Id of the asset.

returns.allowed: A boolean, indicating if the asset is allowed.

params.asset: The contract address of the asset.
params.creditor: The contract address of the Creditor.

returns.recursiveCalls: The number of calls done to different asset modules to process the deposit/withdrawal of the asset.

params.asset: The contract address of the asset.
params.creditor: The contract address of the Creditor.

processIndirectDeposit(address,address,u.details: An indirect deposit, is initiated by a deposit of another derived asset (the upper asset), from which the asset of this Asset Module is an underlying asset.

params.asset: The contract address of the asset.
params.creditor: The contract address of the Creditor.
params.deltaExposureUpperAssetToAsset: The increase or decrease in exposure of the upper asset to the asset of this Asset Module since last interaction.
params.exposureUpperAssetToAsset: The amount of exposure of the upper asset to the asset of this Asset Module.

returns.recursiveCalls: The number of calls done to different asset modules to process the deposit/withdrawal of the asset.
returns.usdExposureUpperAssetToAsset: The USD value of the exposure of the upper asset to the asset of this Asset Module, 18 decimals precision.

processIndirectWithdrawal(address,addres.details: An indirect withdrawal is initiated by a withdrawal of another Derived Asset (the upper asset), from which the asset of this Asset Module is an Underlying Asset.

params.asset: The contract address of the asset.
params.creditor: The contract address of the Creditor.
params.deltaExposureUpperAssetToAsset: The increase or decrease in exposure of the upper asset to the asset of this Asset Module since last interaction.
params.exposureUpperAssetToAsset: The amount of exposure of the upper asset to the asset of this Asset Module.

returns.usdExposureUpperAssetToAsset: The USD value of the exposure of the upper asset to the asset of this Asset Module, 18 decimals precision.

params.creditor: The contract address of the Creditor.
params.maxUsdExposureProtocol_: The maximum USD exposure of the protocol for each Creditor, denominated in USD with 18 decimals precision.
params.riskFactor: The risk factor of the asset for the Creditor, 4 decimals precision.

addAsset(uint256).notice: Adds a new Stargate Pool to the StargateAssetModule.

getRiskFactors(address,address,uint256).notice: Returns the risk factors of an asset for a Creditor.

getValue(address,address,uint256,uint256.notice: Returns the USD value of an asset.

isAllowed(address,uint256).notice: Checks for a token address and the corresponding Id if it is allowed.

processDirectDeposit(address,address,uin.notice: Increases the exposure to an asset on a direct deposit.

processDirectWithdrawal(address,address,.notice: Decreases the exposure to an asset on a direct withdrawal.

processIndirectDeposit(address,address,u.notice: Increases the exposure to an asset on an indirect deposit.

processIndirectWithdrawal(address,addres.notice: Decreases the exposure to an asset on an indirect withdrawal.

setRiskParameters(address,uint112,uint16.notice: Sets the risk parameters of the Protocol for a given Creditor.
